page.title: 19Fishing the River Weaver.2.
page.content: When you get to the river stick to the slow water as it is not a very good idea to fish fast flowing water. Firstly, because fish like slow moving water best and secondly ,because it could be very dangerous. One thing you have to do before you start fishing in the River Weaver and that is you have to get yourself a North West Water Authority licence. This is a good buy because it covers not only the Weaver,but also a lot of other rivers and lakes in the North West. The fish in the Weaver are not really suitable for eating,although you could if you wanted to, so when you have caught your fish make sure that you return them safely to the water.
